summary:
Adds crafting and improving to Alpha Wolf\'s great Witcher 2 Armour port.  Also adds boots/gauntlets/hoods where neccessary to create full, four-piece armor sets - Well Fitted (Heavy), Custom Fit (Light) and Matching Set (Heavy & Light) perks now work with the Witcher armour!!!  

Latest Update: Weapons now added!!!
descriptionHtml:
[center][color=yellow][size=+2] AlphaWolf\'s Witcher Weapons & Armours at The Blacksmiths\' Guild[/color][/size]

[color=green][size=+1]*****Now adds Wicked Jester\'s Scoia\'tael Bow*****[/color][/size]

[color=orange][size=+1]*****Eliminates crafting menu clutter by placing items into their own exclusive anvil and forge*****[/color][/size]


[color=red][size=+1]*****This mod is a crafting .esp only and contains no weapons or armour meshes/textures!!!!*****[/color][/size][/center] 

[color=red][size=+1]How does it work?[/color][/size]

[color=orange][size=+1]1)[/color][/size] Download/Install/NMM Blacksmiths\' Guild core mod
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=17524] http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=17524[/url]

[color=orange][size=+1]2)[/color][/size] Download/Install/NMM Witcher Ultimate Experience
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=9198] http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=9198[/url]
- this will set-up AlphaWolf\'s assets in the background for my esp files to work from

[color=orange][size=+1]3)[/color][/size] Download/Install/NMM Bow of Iorveth
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=18439] http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=18439[/url]
- this will set-up Wicked Jester\'s assets in the background for my esp files to work from

[color=orange][size=+1]4)[/color][/size] Uncheck/De-activate Ultimate Witcher MOD.esm
this step will:
- eliminate \'stray object identifiers/children/references\' carried forward from AlphaWolf\'s original mod
- maintain AlphaWolf\'s mesh and texture assets in the background for my esp files to work from

[color=orange][size=+1]5)[/color][/size] Uncheck/De-activate ScoiataelBow.esp
this step will:
- eliminate the \'Scoia\'Tael Sack\' from Breezehome
- maintain Wicked Jester\'s mesh and texture assets in the background for my esp files to work from

[color=orange][size=+1]6)[/color][/size] Download/Install/NMM 
- Ultimate Witcher Light Armours.esp files (if you want the Light Armors)
- Ultimate Witcher Heavy Armours.esp files (if you want the Heavy Armors)
- Ultimate Witcher Weapons.esp files (if you want the Weapons)
- Ultimate Witcher Races.esp files (if you want the Races and Spells etc.)

[color=orange][size=+1]7)[/color][/size] Confirm my the esp files you have chosen are Activated/Checked
this step will (if applicable):
- add the Witcher Light Armours to AlphaWolf\'s Light Armors Master FORGE at the Blacksmiths\' Guild
- add the Witcher Heavy Armours to AlphaWolf\'s Heavy Armors Master FORGE at the Blacksmiths\' Guild
- add the Witcher Weapons to AlpaWolf\'s Weapons Master ANVIL at the Blacksmiths\' Guild
- add Wicked Jester\'s Scoia\'tael Bow to AlpaWolf\'s Weapons Master ANVIL at the Blacksmiths\' Guild
- distribute AlphaWolf\'s Witcher Armours across the crafting categories
- distribute AlphaWolf\'s Witcher Weapons across the crafting categories
- distribute Wicked Jester\'s Scoia\'tael Bow across the Steel, Elven and Ebony crafting categories
- add a light sprinkling of AlphaWolf\'s Armours and Weapons to the Bandit and Bandit Boss levelled lists
- add a light sprinkling of Wicked Jester\'s Scoia\'tael Bow to the Bandit levelled lists
--- this allows early, mid and late game access to these great armours and weapons for both Smithing and Looting-type players

[color=orange][size=+1]Heavy Armours[/color][/size] (predominantly those with the \'mail skirt\') 
Blue Stripes Combat Jacket - Iron
Seltkirk\'s Armour - Steel
Heavy Elven Armour - Dwarven
Kaedweni Leather Armour - Steel Plate
Zireael\'s Armour - Orcish
Dearg Ruadhri - Ebony
Tir na Lia Armour - Ebony 
Draug Armour - Dragon Plate
Ysgith Armour - Dragon Plate
Vran Armour - Deadric 
Vran Restored Armour - Daedric
Kinslayer\'s Armour - Daedric
---	\'Jackboot\' style boots for all heavy armour sets
--- \'Colour match\' for gauntlets and hood for all heavy armour sets

[color=orange][size=+1]Light Armours[/color][/size] (predominantly the \'blouson\' type)
Leather Jacket - Hide 
Heavy Leather Jacket - Studded
Hunter\'s Armor - Leather 
Raven\'s Armour - Leather
Sword Bandolier with Bag - Leather
Sword Bandolier with Book - Leather
Elven Armour - Elven
Kayran Carapace Armour - Elven 
Kayran Blood Armour - Elven
Hardened Leather Jacket - Scaled
Blasphemer\'s Armour - Glass 
Blasphemer Sanctified - Glass 
Thyssen\'s Armour - Glass 
Dragon Scale Armour - Dragon Scale
---	\'Riding\' style boots for all light armour sets
---	\'Colour match\' for gauntlets and hood for all light armour sets

[color=orange][size=+1]Weapons[/color][/size]
Rusty Steel Sword - Steel (no perk needed)
Steel Short Sword - Steel
Temerian Steel Sword - Steel
Scoia\'tael Hunting Bow - Steel
Witcher Silver Sword - Steel (with Silver \'undead effect\')
Temerian Special Forces\' Sword - Dwarven
Yspadenian Greatsword - Dwarven
Robust Silver Sword - Dwarven (with Silver undead affect)
Scoia\'tael Elven Bow - Elven
Superb Silver Sword - Elven (with Silver \'undead effect\')
Temerian First Rate Sword - Glass
Harpy - Glass (with Silver \'undead effect\')
Gwyhyr - Ebony
Scoia\'tael Ebony Bow - Ebony
Blood Sword - Ebony (with Silver \'undead effect\')
Harvall - Daedric
Vran Greatsword - Daedric

-----------------------------------------------

[color=red][size=+2]Notes:[/color][/size]

- Iorveth\'s Armor has been dropped as it was too buggy and, basically, I am losing my patience with this mod!!! If you want Iorveth\'s Armor it is available as a 4-piece Elven Light Armour Set in:
 [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=17886]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=17886[/url]
 - All weapons and armour have been disenchanted to balance with vanilla weapons and armour and other Blacksmiths\' Guild weapons and armour sets
- All weapons and armour have been disenchanted to allow your own enchantments to match your gameplay style
- All armour sets are available for female characters but have \'male meshes\' - the ladies are going to look pretty \'butch\'
- Sword bandolier/belts have been given minimal light armor rating (they\'ve gotta do at least as much as a set of hide bracers to protect you?!?)  
- Sword bandolier/belts have been given 20 carryweight points to balance with, and complement, Sabre Gear Backpacks and Dragten\'s Bandoliers, Bags and Pouches
- Negotiator Greatsword is not included as I cannot find the dds file to support the meshes

-----------------------------------

[color=red][size=+1]FAQ[/color][/size]

You:
I think weapon/armour \'x\' should be category \'y\' with stats \'z\'!
Me: 
Great, open CK and do it yourself.

You:
I think recipe \'x\' should be \'y\'!
Me: 
Great, open CK and do it yourself.

You:
I think weapon/armour \'x\' would look better in colour \'y\'!
Me:
I ain\'t in charge of meshes, man; textures ain\'t mine either . . . talk to the original authors - they might help you out?!?

You:
Wow, thanks! Looks dope!
Me:
Thanks to you too; nice to know the effort is appreciated! And don\'t forget to thank AlphaWolf for his \'product\' - I\'m just the lowly delivery boy . . .

-----------------------------------

[color=red][size=+1]Change Log:[/color][/size]
V.1.06 - adds Wicked Jester\'s Scoia\'tael Bow to the Weapons file (Jun 12, 1012; affects only the Weapons esp file)
V.1.05 - installed \'sanatized\' files for 1) Light Armours, 2) Heavy Armours, 3) Weapons and 4) Races (Jun 11, 2012)
V.1.04 - added weapons, eliminated Guild esm, adjusted levelled list distribution (Jun 06, 2012)
V.1.03 - correction to esp/esm file mismatch
V.1.02 - added Swordbelts to levelled bandit lists at about 15% spawn rate (tell me if it\'s too high!)
V.1.01 - fixed Fenrir\'s (NPC) schedule so he actually goes to the Argonian Bar & Grill in the evening rather than working the forge all night
V.1.00 - Main Files as described above

----------------------------------

[size=+1][color=orange]PERMISSIONS[/size][/color]

Alpha Wolf is the owner of the intellectual property for porting the assets presented here - I only added the \'crafting/improving.\' 

Feel free to open up my .esp and play with it for your own [u]personal use[/u]; [u]do not[/u] re-upload anything, anywhere, without a PM to me to discuss first.

Check with AlphaWolf with any queries about the meshes/textures.

-------------------------------------------

[size=+1][color=orange]CREDITS[/size][/color]

AlphaWolf - this really is AlphaWolf\'s port!!!
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=9198]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=9198[/url]

AlphaWolf - thanks for the \'okay\' to mess with your stuff . . .

Meshes and textures belong to CDProjektRED, the developer of The Witcher 2 [url=http://www.thewitcher.com]http://www.thewitcher.com[/url]
The game [b]ROCKS![/b] - give it a buy, give it a try . . .
